title: Teacher Professional Development Simulation Through Informal Coaching and Mentoring

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory educational methodologies and the role of educators
context.additional_context: Recreates school settings in VR, strengthening professional development capabilities through informal interactions with fellow teachers and administrators.

learning_goals: Learners can derive lesson improvement strategies through informal coaching with peer teachers at least three times in a VR simulation.
Learners can explain two or more professional development strategies through dialogue simulations with an AI character in a head teacher role.
Learners can design and present informal learning support plans applicable to real school environments through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
